Al hire &yogh;ounge lijf heo liuede &punctelev; in &slong;unne and in ho&rrot;e.
Vnneþe heo wa&slong; tweolf &yogh;er old &punctelev; are heo dude folie :
hire bodi and al hire wille heo dude &punctelev; to &slong;unne of lecherie.

heo ne mi&yogh;te fulfulle hire owene willeHorstmann's note: al. al hire. Should this be a correction? &punctelev; þo bigan heo hire vnder&slong;tonde,

Alle þat bi hire ligge wolden &punctelev; gladliche he dude a fongue;
heo ne &slong;parede leinte ne oþur t&ydot;me &punctelev; p&rrot;eo&slong;t ne oþur non,
riche ne pouere, ne oþur Horstmann: al. om. I don't understand what was omitted weddede men &punctelev; þat heo ne let to hire gon.
Men þat ne hadden none wille &punctelev; &slong;wuch &slong;unne fo&rrot;to do,
with faire wo&rrot;des and fol semblaunt &punctelev; heo b&rrot;ou&yogh;te heom ofte þer-to;

In Ali&slong;aund&rrot;ie heo liuede þis foule lijf &punctelev; &yogh;ere&slong; &slong;euentene,
Þat so muche vildede of womman &punctelev; na&slong; neuere i&slong;ei&yogh;e, ich wene.
On a da&ydot; in herue&slong;t &punctelev; a&slong; þis womman biheold aboute,
bi þe wei&yogh;e heo &slong;ai&yogh; muche folk &punctelev; and manie grete route.
heo þou&yogh;te fo&rrot; heo wa&slong; &slong;o iknowe &punctelev; Ali&slong;aund&rrot;iein euer eche ende,
Þe la&slong;&slong;se &slong;ockne heo hadde of hire folie &punctelev; þanne&slong; heo wolde iwende,
heo þou&yogh;te among þis &slong;traunge men &punctelev; so fale a&slong;e ich i&slong;eo,
Mi wille ich mi&yogh;te muche of heom habbe &punctelev; with heom ichulle beo &punctelev; &yogh;wodere hu&ydot; alle þou&yogh;te.
heo &slong;eiden, heo wolden to Ieru&slong;alem &punctelev; fo&rrot; þe swete rode heo &slong;ou&yogh;ten
Þat &slong;cholde opon þe holie rode da&ydot; &punctelev; eche manne ischewed beo,
And þat euerech guod man þudere wolde. &punctelev; fo&rrot; to honouri þat swete treo
"Mot ich," &slong;eide þis womman &punctelev; "with eov þudere wende?
And of þat craft þat ich ileo&rrot;ned habbe &punctelev; to eov ichulle beon p&rrot;e&slong;t and hende."

Þis womman bigan þo fo&rrot;to &slong;peke &punctelev; " frere Frere Zo&slong;ime, þin o&rrot;e," he &slong;eDe &slong;ede ,
"Ne wilne þou nou&yogh;t þat ich þe abide &punctelev; fo&rrot; ich am withoute wede;
Ne wilne þou nou&yogh;t þat ich &slong;chewie þe &punctelev; oþur wummen fo&rrot;to &slong;chende,
Mi licame, fo&rrot; ich naked am &punctelev; ake lat me awei fram þe wende."
Þis Monek weop and cride &yogh;eo&rrot;ne &punctelev; nolde he &slong;tunte nou&yogh;t;
Fo&rrot; heo is name nemde &slong;o &punctelev; he wa&slong; aferd in is þou&yogh;t.
Þis womman &slong;eide, "&yogh;if þou wolt &punctelev; iwite &yogh;wat ich beo,
Ca&slong;t me &slong;um þing to helielooks like holie in manuscript, Horstmann r. heolie?] me with &punctelev; and on o&rrot;e&slong;un bide fo&rrot; me!"

frere Frere Zo&slong;ime, &yogh;wi wilne&slong;tþou &punctelev; a &slong;unfol w&rrot;echche to seo?

And e&ydot;þer bad oþure&slong; ble&slong;&slong;ingue &punctelev; and noþur nolde it do.
